title: Hour 2 - Jason Hehir (05-18-20)
itunes:title: Hour 2 - Jason Hehir (05-18-20)
description:
Jason Hehir tells Dan that he has not spoke with Michael Jordan since last December. Jason says he wishes that Jerry Krause was around to see if he regrets not bringing back Phil Jackson. Jason tells Dan that Michael Jordan had a reputation for spitting on his food so no one would want any of it.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

content:encoded:
Jason Hehir tells Dan that he has not spoke with Michael Jordan since last December. Jason says he wishes that Jerry Krause was around to see if he regrets not bringing back Phil Jackson. Jason tells Dan that Michael Jordan had a reputation for spitting on his food so no one would want any of it.
